info.author: Jason Petrone
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU General Public License (GPL)
info.description:
threeDS is a Python module for loading and displaying 3D models in the 3DStudio
Max 3DS format. It comes with view3DS, a simple model viewer written in Python.

Requires Numerical Python.   To display scenes you will need PyOpenGL for 
rendering and the Python Imaging Library for texture support.
info.name: threeDS
info.summary: A Python module for loading and displaying 3D models in the 3DStudio Max 3DS format.
info.html_description:
threeDS is a Python module for loading and displaying 3D models in the 3DStudio Max 3DS format. It comes with view3DS, a simple model viewer written in Python.

Requires Numerical Python. To display scenes you will need PyOpenGL for rendering and the Python Imaging Library for texture support.
